fields.name: Wi-Fi access
fields.description: Some airplanes provide Wi-Fi connectivity, allowing passengers to access the internet during the flight.

fields.name: Food and beverages
fields.description: Offering a range of meals and drinks depending on the class of service, from snacks to full-course meals and various beverage options

fields.description: Comfortable sleeping and resting areas during long layovers
